select sp.* from sys_post sp
and sp.post_code like concat('%', #{post.postCode}, '%')
and sp.status = #{status}

select p.post_id, p.post_name, p.post_code from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_post up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_post p ON up.post_id = p.post_id where up.user_id = #{userId}
